name: IMS GOOGLE Search Result Sites: Bigger
description:

Userstyles.org: use "http://www.google.com/search" in "Example URL (Optional)".
One, it is not "optional", two, userStyles and Stylish are shit IMHO
(no Git/GitHub integration, shitty & buggy UI)!
